title: GARYS APARTMENT / DOOR
description: You can open this door when you get the key from Manana.

dialogueTree.title: Door, Basement Apartment: "The door is closed again. Nothing t..."
dialogueTree.text: The door is closed again. Nothing to do here anymore.

links.title: Perception (Hearing): "You hear someone inside, walking fr..."
links.text: You hear someone inside, walking from room to room... whoever lives here must be back home.

dialogueTree.title: Door, Basement Apartment: "The door has braved the elements fo..."
dialogueTree.text: The door has braved the elements for decades. The copper nails holding the upholstery in place have turned green from sea air and so is the knocker, shaped like a lion's head.

links.title: Endurance: "The Royal Lion. Guillaume's Kitten...."
links.text: The Royal Lion. Guillaume's Kitten. This knocker will last a lifetime and then some.

links.title: You: ""I know you're in there!""
links.text: "I know you're in there!"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That already defeats the point, do..."
links.text: "That already defeats the point, doesn't it?" The lieutenant glances at the surrounding windows. "Let's get out of here."

links.title: Door, Basement Apartment: "No answer."
links.text: No answer.

links.title: You: "Press your ear against the door."
links.text: Press your ear against the door.

links.title: Door, Basement Apartment: "Not a sound. The silence is eerie."
links.text: Not a sound. The silence is eerie.

links.title: Inland Empire: "Even the darkness is holding it's b..."
links.text: Even the darkness is holding it's breath inside the apartment.

links.title: Door, Basement Apartment: "Someone is moving around in the apa..."
links.text: Someone is moving around in the apartment. You hear the water being turned off and the sound of dishes clinking together.

links.title: Logic: "The tenant must be cleaning up. Tha..."
links.text: The tenant must be cleaning up. That means you're too late. Nothing more to do here, better report back to Evrart.

links.title: You: "Knock on the door."
links.text: Knock on the door.

links.title: Door, Basement Apartment: "No answer."
links.text: No answer.

links.title: Door, Basement Apartment: "Something hits the ground and shatt..."
links.text: Something hits the ground and shatters inside the apartment.

links.title: Perception (Hearing): "A plate, glass or a mug."
links.text: A plate, glass or a mug.

links.title: Door, Basement Apartment: "Then a running tap is turned off an..."
links.text: Then a running tap is turned off and the complete absence of sounds feels... tense.

links.title: Logic: "You're too late -- the weasel's alr..."
links.text: You're too late -- the weasel's already back in its den. Let's see what Evrart thinks about it.

links.title: You: "Use Mañana's key to unlock the door..."
links.text: Use Mañana's key to unlock the door.

links.title: Door, Basement Apartment: "The key stops mid-way in the lock...."
links.text: The key stops mid-way in the lock. Something's blocking its path. Not a sound is coming from the apartment.

links.title: Interfacing: "The tenant's key is in the lock."
links.text: The tenant's key is in the lock.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant looks first at the d..."
links.text: The lieutenant looks first at the door, then back at you, then signals you to back off from the door.

links.title: Half Light: "You should leave. Leave! Before any..."
links.text: You should leave. Leave! Before anything happens...

links.title: Door, Basement Apartment: "The key stops mid-way in the lock...."
links.text: The key stops mid-way in the lock. Something's blocking its path. You hear a dish smashing and shattering inside the apartment, then everything falls very silent.

links.title: You: "[Leave.]"
links.text: [Leave.]

links.title: Door, Basement Apartment: "As you turn to leave, you hear foot..."
links.text: As you turn to leave, you hear footsteps on the other side -- yes, someone's definitely home.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We should leave," the lieutenant w..."
links.text: "We should leave," the lieutenant whispers, "and go talk with Evrart, tell him what happened -- that we couldn't open the door. Maybe there's a workaround."

links.title: Logic: "Maybe it's a good thing you didn't..."
links.text: Maybe it's a good thing you didn't get to open this stranger's door? Go talk with Evrart, tell him what happened.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That's probably the door Evrart me..."
links.text: "That's probably the door Evrart mentioned. We still need to get the key from this Mañana first though."

links.title: Door, Basement Apartment: "This must be the door Evrart mentio..."
links.text: This must be the door Evrart mentioned. You still need to get the key from Mañana first though.

dialogueTree.title: Door, Basement Apartment: "The door to the 'Weasel's' Den', gu..."
dialogueTree.text: The door to the 'Weasel's' Den', guarded by the lionhead-knocker. Both have seen better days.

links.title: You: "Carefully knock."
links.text: Carefully knock.

links.title: Door, Basement Apartment: "You knock silently. The upholstery..."
links.text: You knock silently. The upholstery muffles the sound. No response comes from the apartment.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I guess no one is in." The lieuten..."
links.text: "I guess no one is in." The lieutenant looks uncomfortable.

links.title: Inland Empire: "You feel eyes on you, watching you..."
links.text: You feel eyes on you, watching you from the windows overlooking the yard.

links.title: Savoir Faire: "You're *pretty* sure the owner of t..."
links.text: You're *pretty* sure the owner of the apartment isn't here. It's safe-ish.

links.title: You: "Press your ear against the door."
links.text: Press your ear against the door.

links.title: Door, Basement Apartment: "The door is slick with rain. You do..."
links.text: The door is slick with rain. You don't hear any movement inside.

links.title: Perception (Hearing): "In fact, it's oddly silent in the y..."
links.text: In fact, it's oddly silent in the yard around you. No birds chirp.

links.title: Door, Basement Apartment: "The leather upholstery is worn and..."
links.text: The leather upholstery is worn and rough against your jaw. You don't hear any movement.

links.title: You: ""Lieutenant, what is your opinion o..."
links.text: "Lieutenant, what is your opinion of this task we're undertaking?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""As I already said," the lieutenant..."
links.text: "As I already said," the lieutenant replies, adjusting his glasses. "I understand this can't be avoided."

links.title: You: ""So you don't mind if I unlock the..."
links.text: "So you don't mind if I unlock the door?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""If the merc tribunal happens befor..."
links.text: "If the merc tribunal happens before we solve this..." His eyes meet yours. "We're looking at casualties. What's one unlocked door compared to that?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""On the other hand..." He looks at..."
links.text: "On the other hand..." He looks at the surrounding windows uncomfortably. "We *could* just leave and tell Evrart we opened the door. No one seems to be tailing us to see if we actually did it."

links.title: You: ""Lie to Evrart? That's also an opti..."
links.text: "Lie to Evrart? That's also an option?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes, presenting a fabrication is k..."
links.text: "Yes, presenting a fabrication is known to get results here and there." He crosses his arms. "You took this task. You make the call."

links.title: Interfacing: "The door is right here. You can jus..."
links.text: The door is right here. You can just open it and be done with this.

links.title: Inland Empire: "Besides, if you never open it, you'..."
links.text: Besides, if you never open it, you're never gonna find out, what's *behind* the door.

links.title: Drama: "I don't know... you're a *pretty* g..."
links.text: I don't know... you're a *pretty* good liar. Are you as good an *infiltrator* as you are a liar?

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It is," the lieutenant remarks. "H..."
links.text: "It is," the lieutenant remarks. "However, we should definitely get the key from this 'Mañana' Evrart mentioned. That would drastically increase our credibility."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I mind that a local thug is using..."
links.text: "I mind that a local thug is using the RCM for his busywork, but if this gets us to the bottom of this hanging then I'm willing to look over it."

links.title: You: ""Got it!""
links.text: "Got it!"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant merely nods in respo..."
links.text: The lieutenant merely nods in response.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""But we do need to get the key from..."
links.text: "But we do need to get the key from this 'Mañana' Evrart mentioned." The lieutenant glances at the door. "Cause we are *not* gonna break the lock."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Let's be honest, this isn't what I..."
links.text: "Let's be honest, this isn't what I joined the RCM for. But -- every day tells you something new about yourself..." the lieutenant replies, still inspecting the padded door.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Apparently, working with the local..."
links.text: "Apparently, working with the local Union boss to get info on an investigation is not something I'm squeamish about."

links.title: You: "Use Mañana's key to unlock the door..."
links.text: Use Mañana's key to unlock the door.

links.title: Door, Basement Apartment: "You try to be as silent as you can...."
links.text: You try to be as silent as you can. It takes a bit of rattling of the handle to loosen the bolt.

links.title: Door, Basement Apartment: "Finally, the door unlocks with a sm..."
links.text: Finally, the door unlocks with a small clack. Thoughts race through your head...

links.title: Perception (Hearing): "The sound of the key turning still..."
links.text: The sound of the key turning still echoes in the yard. Hopefully no one heard.

links.title: Suggestion: "Well buddy, you opened it. No need..."
links.text: Well buddy, you opened it. No need to go inside. It would be *rude*.

links.title: Physical Instrument: "Good job. Let's go now. I'm sure th..."
links.text: Good job. Let's go now. I'm sure there's *nothing* interesting in there.

links.title: Interfacing: "There's *nothing* else to do than l..."
links.text: There's *nothing* else to do than leave and tell Evrart. No *conceivable* reason for you to intrude on the premises.

links.title: Inland Empire: "Only *curiosity* could account for..."
links.text: Only *curiosity* could account for stepping over that threshold. Maybe there's treasure in there? A white alligator? A fountain of quicksilver?

links.title: Logic: "There *might* be important informat..."
links.text: There *might* be important information in the apartment... I mean... there *might*...

links.title: Shivers: "As you hold the opened door you can..."
links.text: As you hold the opened door you can feel the air moving. A little draft. A whistle...

links.title: You: "[Leave.]"
links.text: [Leave.]

dialogueTree.title: Door, Basement Apartment: "The door to cryptofascist's shabby..."
dialogueTree.text: The door to cryptofascist's shabby apartment. It has been locked again.

dialogueTree.title: Door, Basement Apartment: "This must be it. The basement door..."
dialogueTree.text: This must be it. The basement door is weather-worn. The copper nails holding the upholstery in place have turned green from sea air and there's a knocker, shaped like a lion's head.

links.title: Endurance: "The Royal Lion. Guillaume's Kitten...."
links.text: The Royal Lion. Guillaume's Kitten. This knocker will last a lifetime and then some.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That's probably the door Evrart me..."
links.text: "That's probably the door Evrart mentioned. We still need to get the key from this Mañana first though."

links.title: Door, Basement Apartment: "This must be the door Evrart mentio..."
links.text: This must be the door Evrart mentioned. You still need to get the key from Mañana first though.
